entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 69
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 9 Photos related to the special event 1987-1013 Visit, New Āśhram, Vienna, Austria have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 8 low resolution and 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 9 Photos in the smallest gallery: Austria 1987.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, December 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, December 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 41 new Photos were uploaded to 12 Pūjas as follows (32 high resolutions and 9 low resolutions.
(i) 1978-0000 Pūjā, (likely) UK: 3 high resolutions and 8 low resolutions uploaded, link UK 1978.
(ii) 1980-1123 Śhrī Guru Nāṇaka Jayanti Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link UK 1980.
(iii) 1981-0126 Śhrī Lakṣhmī-Viṣhṇu Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1981.
(iv) 1984-0226 Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1984.
(v) 1985-0126 Śhrī Devī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1985.
(vi) 1986-0108 Śhrī Devī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1986.
(vii) 1987-0114 Makar Saṅkrānti Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1987.
(viii) 1988-0508 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1988.
(ix) 1988-1016 Navarātri Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(x) 1988-1019 Navarātri Pūjā: 3 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(xi) 1989-0808 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 10 high resolutions uploaded, link Switzerland 1989.
(xii) 2010-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 1 low resolution uploaded, link Italy 2010.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
